verbose_text: However, Bell et al. recently demonstrated that PmrA, upon phosphorylation by the histidine kinase KdpD, efficiently binds to regulated promoters of the pmrA operon and FPI encoded pdpD.
evidence: PmrA, upon phosphorylation by the histidine kinase KdpD, efficiently binds to regulated promoters of the pmrA operon and FPI-encoded pdpD
